粵.definition: Cantonese; short name for Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]

粵拼.definition: Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems; abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]

粵港澳大灣區.pinyin: Yue4 Gang3 Ao4 Da4 wan1 Qu1
粵港澳大灣區.definition: Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, established in 2017, consisting of Hong Kong, Macao and nine cities in Guangdong

粵漢鐵路.definition: Canton-Hankou Railway, linking Guangzhou and Wuchang, incorporated since 1957 into the Jing-Guang Railway 京廣鐵路|京广铁路[Jing1 Guang3 Tie3 lu4]

粵繡.definition: Guangdong embroidery, one of the four major traditional styles of Chinese embroidery (the other three being 蘇繡|苏绣[Su1 xiu4], 湘繡|湘绣[Xiang1 xiu4] and 蜀繡|蜀绣[Shu3 xiu4])

粵語拼音.definition: Cantonese romanization; Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems
